results.title: Inhibition of autophagy potentiates pemetrexed and simvastatin-induced apoptotic cell death in malignant mesothelioma and non-small cell lung cancer cells
results.text_hl: Inhibition of autophagy potentiates @CHEMICAL_Pemetrexed @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068437 @@@pemetrexed@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced apoptotic cell death in @<m>DISEASE_Mesothelioma_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086002 @@@malignant mesothelioma@@@ and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@non-small cell lung cancer@@@ cells

citations.NLM: Hwang KE, Kim YS, Jung JW, Kwon SJ, Park DS, Cha BK, Oh SH, Yoon KH, Jeong ET, Kim HR. Inhibition of autophagy potentiates pemetrexed and simvastatin-induced apoptotic cell death in malignant mesothelioma and non-small cell lung cancer cells Oncotarget. 2015 Oct 6;6(30):29482-96. PMID: 26334320

results.title: Enhanced apoptosis by pemetrexed and simvastatin in malignant mesothelioma and lung cancer cells by reactive oxygen species-dependent mitochondrial dysfunction and Bim induction.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that combination of @CHEMICAL_Pemetrexed @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068437 @@@pemetrexed@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ potentiates their apoptotic activity beyond that of either drug alone in @<m>DISEASE_Mesothelioma_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086002 @@@malignant mesothelioma@@@ and @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@lung cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Hwang KE, Kim YS, Hwang YR, Kwon SJ, Park DS, Cha BK, Kim BR, Yoon KH, Jeong ET, Kim HR. Enhanced apoptosis by pemetrexed and simvastatin in malignant mesothelioma and lung cancer cells by reactive oxygen species-dependent mitochondrial dysfunction and Bim induction. Int J Oncol. 2014 Oct;45(4):1769-77. PMID: 25096993

results.title: Statins revert doxorubicin resistance via nitric oxide in malignant mesothelioma.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_mevastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C012258 @@@Mevastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 2 inhibitors of @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A (HMGCoA) reductase@@@, potentiated the intracellular accumulation and the @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@cytotoxicity@@@ of @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Mesothelioma_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086002 @@@HMM@@@ cells constitutively expressing @GENE_ABCB1 @GENE_5243 @@@P-glycoprotein@@@ and @GENE_ABCC3 @GENE_8714 @@@multidrug resistance-associated protein 3@@@.

citations.NLM: Riganti C, Orecchia S, Pescarmona G, Betta PG, Ghigo D, Bosia A. Statins revert doxorubicin resistance via nitric oxide in malignant mesothelioma. Int J Cancer. 2006 Jul 1;119(1):17-27. PMID: 16450390
citations.BibTeX: @article{16450390, title={Statins revert doxorubicin resistance via nitric oxide in malignant mesothelioma.}, author={Riganti C and Orecchia S and Pescarmona G and Betta PG and Ghigo D and Bosia A}, journal={Int J Cancer}, volume={119}, number={1}, pages={17-27}}

results.title: Synergistic effect of combined treatment with gamma-tocotrienol and statin on human malignant mesothelioma cells.
results.text_hl: The present study is the first to demonstrate the synergetic effect of statins (@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) and @CHEMICAL_plastochromanol_8 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C013649 @@@gamma-tocotrienol@@@ (gamma-T3) on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Mesothelioma_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086002 @@@malignant mesothelioma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Mesothelioma_Malignant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086002 @@@MM@@@).

citations.NLM: Tuerdi G, Ichinomiya S, Sato H, Siddig S, Suwa E, Iwata H, Yano T, Ueno K. Synergistic effect of combined treatment with gamma-tocotrienol and statin on human malignant mesothelioma cells. Cancer Lett. 2013 Oct 1;339(1):116-27. PMID: 23879968
